json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="excludedAccountIds">
<prop type="array" name="regions">
<prop type="array" name="excludedProjectNumbers">
<prop type="array" name="offerings">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$securityConnector.properties.environmentData.AwsAccount.organizationalData.Organization.excludedAccountIds" options="excluded-account-ids">
<arg type="array" var="$securityConnector.properties.environmentData.AwsAccount.regions" options="regions">
<arg type="array" var="$securityConnector.properties.environmentData.GcpProject.organizationalData.Organization.excludedProjectNumbers" options="excluded-project-numbers">
<arg type="array" var="$securityConnector.properties.offerings" options="offerings" group="Properties">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$securityConnector.properties.environmentData.AwsAccount.organizationalData.Organization.excludedAccountIds" options="excluded-account-ids">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$securityConnector.properties.environmentData.AwsAccount.regions" options="regions">
